clauses.title: They store data on you even if you did not interact with the service
clauses.description: Some services store data on you even if you did not provide that data yourself. For example, users might provide access to their address book, after which a service might also store the phone numbers of that person's contacts.
clauses.clause_text:
We receive information when you view content on or otherwise interact with our services, which we refer to as “Log Data,” even if you have not created an account.
For example, when you visit our websites, sign into our services, interact with our email notifications, use your account to authenticate to a third-party service, or visit a third-party service that includes Twitter content, we may receive information about you

case.text: They store data on you even if you did not interact with the service

clauses.title: The service can read your private messages
clauses.description: The Service is able to access, scan, review or read all user communications, including private messages, which may contain personal or sensitive data.
clauses.clause_text:
When you communicate with others by sending or receiving Direct Messages, we will store and process your communications and information related to them.
This includes link scanning for malicious content, link shortening to http://t.co URLs, detection of spam<sup>4</sup>, abuse and prohibited images, and use of reported issues.
We also use information about whom you have communicated with and when (but not the content of those communications) to better understand the use of our services, to protect the safety and integrity of our platform, and to show more relevant content.

case.text: Private messages can be read

clauses.title: The service can delete specific content without prior notice and without a reason
clauses.description: This service can delete specific content. Usually they will claim they reserve the right to do it at their sole discretion, which is legalese for saying they won't give a specific reason. If the terms say they will not notify you, it shall be included in the quote but if it does not explicitly say they will give you a notice, it can be reasonably inferred that they can do it without telling you.
clauses.clause_text: We may also remove or refuse to distribute any Content on the Services

case.text: Specific content can be deleted without reason and may be removed without prior notice

clauses.title: This service can view your browser history
clauses.description: The service can view your search history and the websites you visit, which is an extremely intrusive way of collecting information that may include personal and/or sensitive data.
clauses.clause_text:
Full quote: "This Log Data includes information such as your IP address, browser type, operating system, the referring web page, pages visited, location, your mobile carrier, device information (including device and application IDs),
search terms (including those not submitted as queries), and cookie information."

case.text: Your browsing history can be viewed by the service

clauses.title: This service holds onto content that you've deleted
clauses.description: Content may remain in backup servers and be retained after deletion, and thus never be completely deleted. This case doesn't apply to contributions that can't be removed due to the nature of the service.
clauses.clause_text: Summary: Despite content being deleted/updated, it will all be distributed broadly, including through their API.

case.text: This service holds onto content that you've deleted

clauses.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data
clauses.description: Location-based information is collected and may be used and/or shared with third parties for purposes not directly related to the services provided (i.e. the Service doesn't rely on the use or share of location data to function properly).
clauses.clause_text: Subject to your settings, we may collect, use, and store additional information about your location - such as your current precise position or places where you’ve previously used Twitter - to operate or personalize our services including with more relevant content like local trends, stories, ads, and suggestions for people to follow.

case.text: This service may collect, use, and share location data

clauses.title: Third party cookies
clauses.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.
clauses.clause_text: Twitter uses third-party services that may collect your information, using cookies for instance. Twitter uses Google Analytics.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

clauses.title: The service collects many different types of personal data
clauses.description: The service collects different kinds of personal data, such as name, demographic information, postal address, biometric data, device information, IDs, contacts, call logs...
clauses.clause_text:
Basic Account Information
  • Public Information
  • Contact Information and Address Books
  • Direct Messages and Non-Public Communications
  • Payment Information

case.text: Many different types of personal data are collected

clauses.title: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason
clauses.description: At any time, your account can be terminated without explanation and without warning by the service.
clauses.clause_text: We may suspend or terminate your account or cease providing you with all or part of the Services at any time for any or no reason

case.text: Your account can be deleted or permanently suspended without prior notice and without a reason

clauses.title: This service tracks you on other websites
clauses.description: The service may use tracking technologies in third-party websites to track your online activity while you aren't visiting their Site.
clauses.clause_text: <b>We receive certain information when you use our services or other websites or mobile applications that include our content, and from third parties including advertisers.

case.text: This service tracks you on other websites

clauses.title: This service can license user content to third parties
clauses.description: By posting content through the Services, users grant them a transferable and/or sublicensable right, which allows user content to be licensed to third parties.
clauses.clause_text: Such additional uses by Twitter, or other companies, organizations or individuals, is made with no compensation paid to you with respect to the Content that you submit, post, transmit or otherwise make available through the Services as the use of the Services by you is hereby agreed as being sufficient compensation for the Content and grant of rights herein

case.text: Your content can be licensed to third parties

clauses.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
clauses.description: The service logs the URL of the last web page you visited before visiting the Site and may use that information to gather more data about you.
clauses.clause_text: This Log Data includes information such as your IP address, browser type, operating system, the referring web page,

case.text: This service tracks which web page referred you to it

clauses.title: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you
clauses.description: If the Government governing the Terms requests personal data of a user of this service, they may not inform/notify the user while complying with the request.
clauses.clause_text: We also reserve the right to access, read, preserve, and disclose any information as we reasonably believe is necessary to (i) satisfy any applicable law, regulation, legal process or governmental request

case.text: Your personal data may be disclosed to comply with government requests without notice to you

clauses.title: This service gathers information about you through third parties
clauses.description: This Service may employ, either identifiable or non-identifiable, data collection from third party sources about you.
clauses.clause_text: We use information you provide to us and data we receive, including Log Data and data from third parties, to make inferences like what topics you may be interested in, how old you are, and what languages you speak.

case.text: Information is gathered about you through third parties

clauses.title: Your profile is combined across various products
clauses.description: When using multiple services from one same company, they can combine these (unrelated) information sources about you to build up a single richer user profile about you.
clauses.clause_text: In addition to information you share with us, we use your Tweets, content you’ve read, Liked, or Retweeted, and other information to determine what topics you’re interested in, your age, the languages you speak, and other signals to show you more relevant content.

case.text: Your profile is combined across various products

clauses.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.
clauses.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.
clauses.clause_text: Our ad partners and affiliates share information with us such as browser cookie IDs, mobile device IDs, hashed email addresses, demographic or interest data, and content viewed or actions taken on a website or app.

case.text: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

clauses.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.
clauses.description: If the service gets acquired or is involved in a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale, your personal data may be transferred or sold.
clauses.clause_text:
3.4

Affiliates and Change of Ownership

In the event that we are involved in a bankruptcy, merger, acquisition, reorganization, or sale of assets, your personal data may be sold or transferred as part of that transaction.

case.text: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction

clauses.title: This service receives your location through GPS coordinates
clauses.description: Unless the service relies on Geo Location, this case is to be assigned to points that don't need your GPS coordinates to function properly.
clauses.clause_text:
Precise location data

You can turn on Twitter’s location services, letting Twitter pinpoint your position. This enables you to use additional features on Twitter, like Tweeting with your precise location.

 

Tweet your location

You can choose to share your location in a Tweet publicly, letting everyone know you’re at an event, venue, or anywhere else.

case.text: This service receives your precise location through GPS coordinates

clauses.title: The service uses your personal data for advertising
clauses.description: Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites.
clauses.clause_text: We use this information for things like keeping your account secure and showing you more relevant Tweets, people to follow, events, and ads.

case.text: Your personal data is used for advertising

clauses.title: This service throttles your use
clauses.description: The service may impose limits or restrictions to the use of the service, thus negatively impacting users experience. They may do so without reason or prior notice.
clauses.clause_text: We also retain the right to create limits on use and storage at our sole discretion at any time.

case.text: Your use is throttled

clauses.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
clauses.description: Your data is stored all over the world, including in countries where data protection rules may differ from the ones of the service's jurisdiction or those of your country jurisdiction.
clauses.clause_text: including the transfer of this information to the United States, Ireland, and/or other countries

case.text: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

clauses.title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user
clauses.clause_text: IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AGGREGATE LIABILITY OF THE TWITTER ENTITIES EXCEED THE GREATER OF ONE HUNDRED U.S. DOLLARS (U.S. $100.00) OR THE AMOUNT YOU PAID TWITTER, IF ANY, IN THE PAST SIX MONTHS FOR THE SERVICES GIVING RISE TO THE CLAIM. THE LIMITATIONS OF THIS SUBSECTION SHALL APPLY TO ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY, WHETHER BASED ON WARRANTY, CONTRACT, STATUTE, TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE) OR OTHERWISE, AND WHETHER OR NOT THE TWITTER ENTITIES HAVE BEEN INFORMED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF ANY SUCH DAMAGE, AND EVEN IF A REMEDY SET FORTH HEREIN IS FOUND TO HAVE FAILED OF ITS ESSENTIAL PURPOSE.

case.text: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user

clauses.title: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication
clauses.description: The service tracks the user count or some actions of the user; this is usually used for statistics. For example, emails sent by a service can contain a pixel tag, which is a small, clear image that can tell them whether or not you have opened an email and what your IP address is.
clauses.clause_text: In order to operate our services, we keep track of how you interact with links across our services. This includes links in emails we send you and links in Tweets that appear on other websites or mobile applications.

case.text: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication

clauses.title: If you offer suggestions to the service, they may use that without your approval or compensation, but they do not become the owner
clauses.description: The service may employ a broad copyright license over feedback, proposals, ideas and suggestions submitted, including the right to use them without restriction, compensation or obligation to the user, but they do not claim ownership on them.
clauses.clause_text: Any feedback, comments, or suggestions you may provide regarding Twitter, or the Services is entirely voluntary and we will be free to use such feedback, comments or suggestions as we see fit and without any obligation to you.</

case.text: If you offer suggestions to the service, they may use that without your approval or compensation, but they do not become the owner

clauses.title: This service provides archives of their Terms of Service so that changes can be viewed over time
clauses.description: This case applies to Services whose agreements provide previous versions, so that users can compare them and understand how the Service seems to evolve regarding user rights.
clauses.clause_text:
Archive of Previous Terms

 .

case.text: Archives of their agreements are provided so that changes can be viewed over time

clauses.title: The service informs users about the risk of publishing personal info online
clauses.clause_text: You are responsible for your Tweets and other information you provide through our services, and you should think carefully about what you make public, especially if it is sensitive information.

case.text: You are informed about the risk of publishing personal info online

clauses.title: You can retrieve an archive of your data
clauses.description: Users can request a copy of the data collected through the services and infer from it the amount of personal information that is processed and stored by the Service. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text: There is a button in the account settings to retrieve an archive of all your tweets.

case.text: You can retrieve an archive of your data

clauses.title: An onion site accessible over Tor is provided
clauses.description: Tor is a software for anonymous communication that directs Internet traffic through an overlay network. Onion sites are only available through Tor browser and provide additional security and anonymity to users.

case.text: An onion site accessible over Tor is provided

clauses.title: This service provides a way for you to export your data
clauses.clause_text: You can also download information you have shared on Twitter

case.text: This service provides a way for you to export your data

clauses.title: The service allows you to use pseudonyms
clauses.description: You don't need to provide your full name to use the Service and you are allowed to use a pseudonym instead.
clauses.clause_text: You can also use Twitter under a pseudonym if you prefer not to use your name.

case.text: Pseudonyms are allowed

clauses.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
clauses.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.
clauses.clause_text: You may end your legal agreement with Twitter at any time by deactivating your accounts and discontinuing your use of the Services.

case.text: You have the right to leave this service at any time

clauses.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
clauses.description: You can update your account preferences and/or easily unsubscribe of email/sms lists to stop receiving promotional communications.
clauses.clause_text: You can control most communications from the Services

case.text: You can opt out of promotional communications

clauses.title: You can choose with whom you share content
clauses.description: Users can decide whether or not they want their content to be shared and they can control how and with whom it is shared.
clauses.clause_text:
Your profile information is displayed under your photo and username on your profile page.

Close tooltip

Keep a low profile

Friends want to tag you in a photo? Lucky you. If you’re not into that sort of thing, you can always change your settings.

Close tooltip Close Think carefully

What you Tweet becomes instantly public worldwide on Twitter, and can appear on other media like websites, newspapers, or television.

case.text: You can choose with whom you share content

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.
clauses.clause_text: Effective: June 18, 2020

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
clauses.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.
clauses.clause_text: However, some of our services may not function properly if you disable cookies.

case.text: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

clauses.title: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify
clauses.description: The service may update the Terms without notice, but if they significantly change the agreements in a manner that importantly and/or negatively affects the way the service is used, users will be notified.
clauses.clause_text:
We may revise these Terms from time to time.
The changes will not be retroactive, and the most current version of the Terms, which will always be at twitter.com/tos, will govern our relationship with you.
We will try to notify you of material revisions, for example via a service notification or an email to the email associated with your account.
By continuing to access or use the Services after those revisions become effective, you agree to be bound by the revised Terms.

case.text: You should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify

clauses.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service
clauses.description: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs, including tangible (e.g. profits) and intangible losses (e.g. data), resulting from the use or inability to use the service or any other matter relating to the service.
clauses.clause_text: (ii) any harm to your computer system, loss of data, or other harm that results from your access to or use of the Services or any Content.

case.text: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service

clauses.title: They may stop providing the service at any time
clauses.description: They may discontinue the services without prior notice, at any time, for any or no reason. They usually assume no liability for losses and damages resulting from this suspension.
clauses.clause_text: We may stop (permanently or temporarily) providing the Services or any features within the Services to you or to users generally.

case.text: They may stop providing the service at any time

clauses.title: defend, indemnify, hold harmless; survives termination
clauses.clause_text: In all such cases, the Terms shall terminate, including, without limitation, your license to use the Services, except that the following sections shall continue to apply: II, III, V, and VI.

case.text: Defend, indemnify, hold harmless; survives termination

clauses.title: This service does not condone any ideas contained in its user-generated contents
clauses.clause_text: Full quote: "We do not endorse, support, represent or guarantee the completeness, truthfulness, accuracy, or reliability of any Content or communications posted via the Services or endorse any opinions expressed via the Services."

clauses.description: The service provider expressly does not claim to provide uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service.
clauses.clause_text: The Twitter Entities make no warranty or representation and disclaim all responsibility and liability for: (i) the completeness, accuracy, availability, timeliness, security or reliability of the Services or any Content.

case.text: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

clauses.title: This service prohibits users sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages
clauses.description: Users are not allowed to use the service for chain letters, junk mail, spamming or any other distribution of content to people who have not agreed to receiving it.
clauses.clause_text: (v) interfere with, or disrupt, (or attempt to do so), the access of any user, host or network, including, without limitation, sending a virus, overloading, flooding, spamming, mail-bombing the Services, or by scripting the creation of Content in such a manner as to interfere with or create an undue burden on the Services.

case.text: You are prohibited from sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages

clauses.description: The service does not allow any attempts at hacking or otherwise gaining unauthorized access to other users' computers.
clauses.clause_text: probe, scan, or test the vulnerability of any system or network or breach or circumvent any security or authentication measures.

clauses.description: This service does not provide any guarantees as to its usability or fitness for the users' purposes. Users agree to use it at their own risk, accepting any possible bugs, malfunctions or harm to their devices.
clauses.clause_text: You understand and agree that the Services are provided to you on an “AS IS” and “AS AVAILABLE” basis.

case.text: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk

clauses.title: This service is only available to users of a certain age
clauses.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.
clauses.clause_text: In any case, you must be at least 13 years old, or in the case of Periscope 16 years old, to use the Services.

case.text: This service is only available to users over a certain age

clauses.title: If you are the target of a copyright claim, your content may be removed
clauses.description: The content you have published on the service may be removed if it infringes copyright.
clauses.clause_text: We reserve the right to remove Content that violates the User Agreement, including for example, copyright or trademark violations or other intellectual property misappropriation,

case.text: If you are the target of a copyright claim, your content may be removed

clauses.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided

clauses.clause_text: We do not endorse, support, represent or guarantee the completeness, truthfulness, accuracy, or reliability of any Content or communications posted via the Services

case.text: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided

clauses.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
clauses.description: Should any portion of the Terms of Service be unenforceable or invalid, that portion will be enforced to the fullest extent permitted by applicable law and the remainder of the TOS will remain valid and enforceable.
clauses.clause_text:
>

In the event that any provision of these Terms is held to be invalid or unenforceable, then that provision will be limited or eliminated to the minimum extent necessary, and the remaining provisions of these Terms will remain in full force and effect.

case.text: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

clauses.title: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision
clauses.description: Even if the service does not or not always enforce all of the rules or provisions contained in its terms, they still apply. Users can at a later time still be held accountable for violating provisions that have not been enforced consistently.
clauses.clause_text: Twitter’s failure to enforce any right or provision of these Terms will not be deemed a waiver of such right or provision

case.text: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision

clauses.title: This service requires first-party cookies
clauses.description: First-party cookies only belong to the domain of the service and not a third party.
clauses.clause_text: Like many websites, we use cookies and similar technologies to collect additional website usage data and to operate our services.

case.text: First-party cookies are used

clauses.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
clauses.description: You are responsible for protecting the confidentiality of your password and for maintaining the security of your account. Any activity occurring under your account is your responsibility, whether authorized by you or not.
clauses.clause_text:
You are responsible for safeguarding your account, so use a strong password and limit its use to this account.
We cannot and will not be liable for any loss or damage arising from your failure to comply with the above.

clauses.clause_text: THE TWITTER ENTITIES DISCLAIM ALL WARRANTIES AND CONDITIONS, WHETHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, OR NON-INFRINGEMENT.

case.text: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet your expectations or requirements

clauses.title: This service collects your IP address for location use
clauses.clause_text: When you use Twitter, even if you’re just looking at Tweets, we receive some personal information from you like the type of device you’re using and your IP address.

case.text: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location

clauses.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.
clauses.description: Even though the Do Not Track (DNT) header was not implemented perfectly, services should not track users whose browsers send a DNT header.
clauses.clause_text: We do not support the Do Not Track browser option.

case.text: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
